subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: At the Australian Open, Roger Federer is the 3-1 favorite on the men’s side over the defending champion Rafael Nadal. On the women’s side, Serena Williams is a slim favorite over Kim Clijsters.
snippet: At the Australian Open, Roger Federer is the 3-1 favorite on the men’s side over the defending champion Rafael Nadal. On the women’s side, Serena Williams is a slim favorite over Kim Clijsters.
